programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A shepherd ignores the Cartwrights' warning not to drive his flock across the Ponderosa; guest Everett Sloane.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A Ponderosa ranch hand faces charges of killing the wife of the U.S. marshal (Claude Akins) who came to arrest him.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A disabled New Orleans police inspector (Lloyd Nolan) comes to arrest Ben on a 20-year-old murder charge.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam is taken hostage by a band of U.S. Army prisoners who have escaped and sought refuge on the Ponderosa.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A wanderer seeking his parents' lynchers, arrives in Virginia City as Ben and Adam are convicted of murder.

programme.title: MacShayne: Final Roll of the Dice
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino trouble-shooter (Kenny Rogers) helps a rock star (Maria Conchita Alonso) charged with the murder of her ex-husband.

programme.title: Below the Border
programme.desc: The Rough Riders (Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton) pose as strangers and nab outlaws near the Mexican border.

programme.title: Waco
programme.desc: Waco's citizens hire an outlaw to clean up their town.

programme.title: Northern Patrol
programme.desc: Corporal Webb finds a man who seems to have hung himself after writing a suicide note. Webb notes this happened while the suicider was in the midst of cooking himself a meal, and concludes that all is not right in this part of Canada.

programme.title: Rebel City
programme.desc: A professional gambler sets out to even the score with his father's killers, Copperheads terrorizing 1846 Kansas.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The deputized Cartwrights sentence a murderer to hang at dawn.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A young bank robber gets a job on the Ponderosa to prevent the sheriff from finding the other members of his gang.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When a Ranger suddenly resigns without explanation, Rynning discovers that the man is hiding a secret.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: The wife of a preacher who recently established a mission for Apaches living near Gaheyville receives a suspicious telegram and fears her husband has been murdered; Travis learns the truth.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark and his partner Frankie head to Tombstone, Arizona to find Doc Holliday with suspicion that Holliday is involved in the gang activity there; starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: The Younger Brothers, certain their past with the Quantrill Riders prevents them from living an honest life, plan a bold bank robbery that Matt and Frankie attempt to thwart.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy exposes a fraudulent life insurance company.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: When students become lawmen for a day, the new "sheriff's" uncle takes advantage.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A new family in Paradise Valley mistakes outlaws for a welcoming committee.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Outlaws misinterpret a comment made by Roy and Dale.

programme.desc: Gang of crooks locks Roy in his own jail. (1951)

programme.desc: Pat and Nellybelle are kidnapped by a gang of outlaws.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A teacher becomes increasingly nervous after a stagecoach robbery.

programme.desc: A young man decides to escape his overbearing father by joining the Carlson gang.

programme.desc: A trigger-happy rancher (Don C. Harvey) joins a posse searching for his brother-in-law.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: While visiting a nearby town, Ray and Dale meet a girl (Frances Karath) whose horse was stolen.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy and Dale assist a young couple who are trying to reclaim their ranch.

programme.desc: Television cowboy Roy Rogers fights for law and order in the West.

programme.desc: A lady banker turns to murder in order to gain possession of some oil-rich property.

programme.desc: The Rough Riders (Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton) act like strangers to catch a crooked lawyer.
